mapper.update: update jig_entity set life_percent = #{percent} where code = #{jigLife.code} and seq_id = #{jigLife.seq_id}
mapper.select: SELECT jig_entity.`code`, jig_entity.seq_id, jig_entity.used_count, jig_entity.life_percent, repair_submit_history.repair_type, count(repair_submit_history.repair_type) repair_count FROM jig_entity LEFT JOIN repair_submit_history ON jig_entity.`code` = repair_submit_history.`code` AND jig_entity.seq_id = repair_submit_history.seq_id WHERE repair_submit_history.repair_type != '' GROUP BY jig_entity.`code`, jig_entity.seq_id
